div.p: Spring moult phenology reaction norms of hares at the Gardiner study site, MT (17/9/2010 to 9/7/2012). ( a) Autumn coat colour moult phenologies of six individual hares observed over two autumns. ( b) Autumn (left) moult reaction norms of the individuals shown in ( a) combined, and spring (right) moult reaction norm of one hare observed over two springs. Each coloured line represents reaction norms of a different individual in year 2011 (dashed line) and either 2010 or 2012 (full lines).
